title: Dying Days
description: Sunny Florida, beautiful beaches, no traffic on A1A... Zombies roaming the dunes in search of the living...Darlene Bobich in a fight to survive, find food, safety and ammo for her Desert Eagle before its too late... the undead are coming to exterminate the human race...Dying Days are upon us... The Undead Roam the Earth... Searching for the living in an apocalyptic wastelandNow includes both "Darlene Zombie Killer" and the first "Dying Days" zombie novellas in one release!
author: Armand Rosamilia
